website_summaries.verdict: With soothing aloe and colloidal oatmeal, this no-rinse shampoo spray helps cats with dry skin and other flaky conditions.
pros: Removes dander, calms hot spots and itching
Contains baking soda and aloe, which are antibacterial, antifungal, antimicrobial, antiseptic, and hypoallergenic
Soap and detergent-free, so it won't strip coat or irritate eyes
cons: Bottles sometimes arrive without the spray cap, which makes them difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: Great natural pet relief!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, my cat loved it, as it relieved his craving to scratch where he couldn't reach, namely all down his spine. The effect of a good rubbing (did not use the spray option) with a soaked towel on his back lasted about 3 days. So I guess this will be a 2x weekly application for him. His fur was very soft the next day (shorthair domestic) and he smelled like the little flower that he is.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.58

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Mats Away!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! I've been using this on my long haired cat every day for about 2 weeks. His fur is soo soft! Rarely gets mats. Mats are small when he does get them. I'm so very happy with this product 🤩
customer_reviews.author: eva vincent

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing - but why the price hike??
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome!! I use a palm rubber brush and spray it on there and rub on. I have an obese hospice cat that can't clean himself very well - this is the only product I have tried that instantly helped the dandruff and his terrible skin allergies! Used it for dandruff on two all black cats as well. But I paid $18 - why the price hike to $27?!? Deducted a star for price.
customer_reviews.author: Nonya

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know this product was available or I'd have gotten it much sooner. My 15 year old cat has some difficulty grooming the area just forward of her tail and this took care of the dander & dry itchy skin ... thanks for making her comfortable again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Myres

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product--I unequivacally recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I thought the balding feral was dying. Spraying was not an option. Dipping my fingers in the solution to apply provoked purrs. If we start at the back, cotton ball application works. His fur is now soft and shiny, the sores are healing, and hair is growing back after 2 weeks 1-2 daily applications. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Observer One

customer_reviews.title: Great product - would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item specifically for the occasional dry patches (flaky skin) that my cats get. One cat always has a dry patch on her neck where we apply the monthly flea/tick drops. I was pleased with how quickly this product worked to relieve her flaky skin. It smells nice (I am very sensitive to smells and would probably not use a product with an overwhelming fragrance - this spray has a soft, clean smell that I don't mind at all). It left her coat very soft. Also, my cats don't seem to mind when I apply it. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Kowalczyk

customer_reviews.title: CatFresh Oatmeal Skin & Coat Spray
customer_reviews.text: She's still scratching, LOL! Sorry.. and the spray sound scares her too. I did spray it on my hands and tried to rub it into her hair but she licked it off and kept vomiting it up. Maybe it's just MY cat? :)
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Dandruff be damned!
customer_reviews.text: My ckd baby looks like her old self again! Smells great (light inoffensive scent...this coming froma migraineur), takes away both dandruff and oil, and best of all causes no reaction to my sensitive girl (16 yrs old). It did come with a sprayer, but if ur baby is anything like mine...I recommend u spray it on a paper towel and then wipe them down. It will go over much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Really helps!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I've been using it about ten days on my cat and it has really helped. He has dry, flaky skin on his back and brushing alone was not getting the flakes out. I've sprayed this on his back and worked it down to the skin with my fingers, Once I've worked it in, I brush his fur and the flakes comes right out! The flakes have greatly diminished and his coat is softer and in better condition. I will definitely continue to use this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my licking cat!
customer_reviews.text: We're still waiting for new hair growth, but my 8.5 year old male cat's skin does feel cooler to the touch. It almost seems as if he enjoys being sprayed down, so it must feel good for him. I haven't noticed any excessive licking, so I'm sure that it's just a matter of time before his hair starts growing back. I have to say that I'm very pleased so far, and I have recommended this product to others. I like that it's natural and organic, using items that we know are beneficial (baking soda and oatmeal).
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kihn-Foerster

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I would of made this product a tad bit cheaper. However, I will say it does work very well on my cats hair. Definitely gives her a clean look. She’s older so she struggles to clean herself. I wished the product had a spray and not so much as a JET OUT. Regardless, I love the product for my long haired cat. My product doesn’t have a oatmeal smell to it. Barely smell anything.
customer_reviews.author: Babbylove

customer_reviews.title: Would be good but no sprayer
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesnt seem to mind this, the smellnus nice, and it makes him soft. Unfortunately it didnt include the sprayer, so I had to just put some in my hand, which didnt work very well. If the spray nozzle had been included I would likely give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LaRene Gidcumb

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped my two cats with their dandruff. They are senior cats with arthritis and it’s difficult for him to groom their back. I added this to our brush routine, three times per week and it has made a huge difference. No more dandruff. They key is to rub it in, way past the fur into their skin and let it dry before you brush the cat. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Love it. This summer we had a severe fleas ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This summer we had a severe fleas and mosquitoes infestation in our yard and some of our cats had a severe allergy with bald spot and constant scratching. This product helped with the itchiness soothing the skin taking away the crusts and allowing the king to heal and hair grow back. Great for those animals that have skin allergies. The smell is not super pleasent but it is a Very good product. love it
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective product
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up our elderly male cats loss off hair along his lower back, which occurred every winter. Small sores and dry skin cleared up within 2 weeks !! Previous years resulted in expensive vetinnary visits in excess of $100.00 plus dollars for cortisone shots which are hard on the cats kidneys. Cat stopped chewing and licking excessively the irritated area upon first application. This product is fantastic in its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: River rat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: This spray worked really well on dirty areas on my cat’s backs. But didn’t de-tangle as it said it would. And brushing after it’s dry was tricky. I’m going to try it again and this time brush while wet and then again when dry. I’d buy this again bc it’s easy.
customer_reviews.author: patricia z. choo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitty
customer_reviews.text: Our longhaired cat gets flaky, irritated skin near her tail. It's been worse than usual this spring with allergies, to the point she would "yell" at us if we touched her near that area. I thought I'd try this product before subjecting her to a vet visit, and problem solved! Nice smell, too!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for sprays for my cat that helped him with his mysterious itching and dandruff. Granted, my cats itching is very mild it still makes me paranoid. I always pride myself over my cat having a very soft fur, but after this spray it has became significantly softer almost instantly after applying and it drying. It has a subtle smell that doesn't smell too synthetic. Sort of soapy smell. Overall I love this product. Wish it wasn't so expensive though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on the reviews. Our overweight cat had severe dandruff on his back. We were amazed at the results on the first application. Hardly any dandruff and his fur became very soft and silky. Of course we can't ask him but I would think he must be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, cat doesn't mind using it
customer_reviews.text: We just got this product, but so far it has been easy to use. Our biggest challenge was just how to use it best with our cat since we use a spray water bottle to enforce "NO!" for things like clawing the furniture.... but we were able to use gently spray this on a brush, then use the brush on her. So far she's let us use this and she isn't scratching quite as much.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Family

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has really bad matted down fur. I did two treatments of this and its pretty much gone. She also has dandruff and it gets worse as the seasons change. It was to the point that it looked like she was out in the snow. This stuff got rid of it! She's such a happier cat.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my rescue kitty's backdruff. I spray it up against the skin from her mid to lower back, massage in and then comb thru with extra fine comb to distribute evenly & remove any flakes. Once every couple of months 💖
customer_reviews.author: Lyl Osita

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It smells fine--not herb-flower-perfume overwhelming, just lightly pleasant. It's made kitty's coat silky and shiny, and it has also reduced her dander, which gets pretty bad in the winter. Kitty loves to sit on the heat vents, and then she really goes after the inevitable dry skin itchy spots. So, although kitty runs for hard cover when I get out the bottle, it's worth the game of chase-and-spritz to prevent her spree licking! No more bare spots or raw skin!
customer_reviews.author: ElfN

customer_reviews.title: runaway cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates this stuff! It may have been the sprayer which freaked her out, now I just have to pick up the bottle and she runs away....I'm going to try spraying the stuff on her brush and my hands to see if I can de-program her from disliking the scent. I hope she'll get used to this as I would like to try and remove some of her matts....
customer_reviews.author: K. Swanny

customer_reviews.title: WTH
customer_reviews.text: Would love to be able to review but no sprayer. Am I supposed to just dump it on my cat?
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this spray in hopes that it would help alleviate our cat's dandruff problem, and I've only sprayed it on him twice and the difference is amazing! The flakes are almost gone and his fur doesn't have the slightly oily feel it previously had. I'm very impressed with the effectiveness of this spray and plan to keep on using it to prevent the dandruff from coming back!
customer_reviews.author: sandragb

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and helps de-tangle my cats hair. Leaves it super soft and shiny! They hate it though because they think they’re being punished :-/
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: No expiration info, no spray tip! Incomplete product shipped
customer_reviews.text: I did not received a spray tip, only the bottle with the solution, in a plastic opened bag (unsealed!). There is no info about the expiration date on the bottle, nor did I got a box for the product! I am worried because I want to use it on my allergic cat, there is no way I will apply a solution on her damaged skin without knowing the expiration date!
customer_reviews.author: Ana B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for my cat's skin issues
customer_reviews.text: It does help my old cat with some of his skin issues. Shedding less, looks shinny and the bald spots are filling up. He does not like to be sprayed at so we have a very soft sponge that I use to spread this lotion. The vendor was very attentive contacting me for follow up. Not necessary but she did.
customer_reviews.author: E. de Mello

customer_reviews.title: Catfresh skin and coat spray
customer_reviews.text: My longhair cat has a problem with dander on her back near her tail. This product is wonderful at getting rid of the problem without any skin irritation. Very easy to use & the price is great. Very glad I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: an amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Has helped my older cat immensely!
customer_reviews.text: I have an aging male 16 year old kitty with thinning hair and massive amounts of dander. I started using this spray a couple of weeks ago and already his coat feels healthier and the dander is reduced to almost nothing. It smells great and is the only spray I have ever been able to get him to stand still for. He doesn't even try to run when I soak him and rub it in. Fantastic product!!!
customer_reviews.author: LGSP

customer_reviews.title: No spray head came like pictures and described
customer_reviews.text: Mine got shipped and I was so excited to use it but the spray head was not included like pictures and described. I hope it will come with the exchange. If it doesn’t I will be returning and putting in a worse report.
customer_reviews.author: Truthful

customer_reviews.title: CatFresh Natural Oatmeal Skin and Coat Spray
customer_reviews.text: Helped my two Siamese kitties, who had dandruff. I spray it onto a natural baby wipe and after brushing them, them down with the Oatmeal Skin and Coat Spray. The dandruff is gone, as long as I continue to use it like a lotion on dry skin - everyday. Excellent product. Please smell, very minimal, just a very light fragrance. Kitties seem to like it. They are much improved. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: catlady

customer_reviews.title: Want beautiful fur?? Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I have a ragdoll cat with a dandruff problem and this spray has made a big difference in the dandruff as well as give my cat a nice shine to her fur. She's a skittish rescue so I spray some in my hands and work it through the fur and then comb her. The smells not too much that it bothers her senses and overall just a great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Spray Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, really works! I have two old cats that cannot physically handle being bathed due to arthritis. (Licking themselves afterwards, even when blown dry, they get all stove up.) This cleans them up really nice without any hassle. They like the brushing too.
customer_reviews.author: dairymaiden

customer_reviews.title: the only issue is that my cats are now afraid of the bottle because they don't like being sprayed
customer_reviews.text: This spray has appeared to be working for the cat eczema, the only issue is that my cats are now afraid of the bottle because they don't like being sprayed. It smells really nice and there's basically no way to put anything on cats that they'll enjoy (so it's not the fault of the product). I rest easiest knowing it's natural and i'm glad my two kitties now have less eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. My cat's dandruff completely disappeared after two to three uses, and his coat is noticeably healthier and softer. Surprisingly, he not only doesn't seem to mind being sprayed with this product, but he actually seems to enjoy it. I think he knows that it is helping him. I will continue to use this product and recommend it to others. Also, the owners of the company seem to be really nice people who genuinely care about their product and their customers' satisfaction. Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: Guitarzan

customer_reviews.title: Condition While You Groom
customer_reviews.text: If you have a long haired cat like me then you need this spray. I sprayed a little on comb then combed cats fur and like magic the hair Matt started to loosen from cats skin. It will take a couple sessions of combing but this spray helps to condition lumps safely. I like that the oatmeal in product is also good for cost and skin.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Nice, fresh smell
customer_reviews.text: The cat was dry and itchy in the hip/tail area. He appeared to get immediate relief the first time I used it. Nice, fresh smell, but not overwhelming. I like that it has natural ingredients. I think this will be good for the cats in the winter when their skin gets dry.
customer_reviews.author: MittenChick

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT product in this case you really get what you ...
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT product in this case you really get what you pay for. My elderly cat Orion has sensitive skin anxiety and allergies (lol first world problems) and his coat was starting to look positively mangy. It was back to shining after one application. I only need to bathe him twice a month now and apply this once a week. He is back to walking around the neighborhood showing off.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Calming to the skin
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to get my cat even sprayed with this because she is very skittish about spray bottles, she is a rescue, and I have no clue what experience she's had with them, but obviously not good ones. That is the only downfall to this product, other than that it does calm the skin and smells wonderful, does wonders for the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Tried on my cat. Just applied on her back. Smells good. But cat did not like the sound the spray makes. Was very nervous. After she dried, she smells and looks better)
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian

customer_reviews.title: Dandruff gone. Helps keep mats from forming
customer_reviews.text: Dandruff and matted hair gone. We did have to cut some mats out because they were too matted to comb out but my long hair seems fine now
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for flaky dry skin. It leaves her skin moisturized and her coat shiny. Smells fresh but not like perfume. Dries fast. The only thing is my cat didn’t like the sprayer. It scared her so I put it in a smaller bottle and just poured it on.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: No More Dry Skin.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is overweight. So she cannot clean her back. I have applied this spray 3 times in a 7 day period, very liberal spray. Her skin is all cleared of bumps and flakes. Also her hair is silky again. Very good product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Byrddog

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell of the spray
customer_reviews.text: I thought that using this between shampoos might help my cat stop pulling her hair out. I'm just starting to come to terms with the fact that she's a neurotic nervous wreck. I like the smell of the spray. I used it on all my cats and their coats were very shiny.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chestnut

customer_reviews.title: It helps.
customer_reviews.text: My Mom was desperate to find something to help her cat's dandruff and itching problem. She tried using fish oil supplements and changing to grain free food with no success. We ordered this and she says it helps a little bit and makes her fur a bit softer.
customer_reviews.author: dreamweaver

customer_reviews.title: For Dogs and Cats
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my dogs and cats for static and dusty fur. No allergic reactions, and it does help to sooth itchy skin.
customer_reviews.author: ChoosyChels

customer_reviews.title: Happy We Purchased This!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this spray for our cat and a furminator de-matting took. Our cat had dry, flaky skin and mats. She is doing so much better after using this spray when we brush. It’s amazing! We like the scent of it a lot as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far ok
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far. Was easy to use and kitty didn't freak out like I expected. Kitty has skin issues so will tell with time the effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hasbrouck

customer_reviews.title: Smell is good, definitely could see shine on kitty's back after ...
customer_reviews.text: Smell is good, definitely could see shine on kitty's back after it dried and we brushed the cat. Cat still has flakes but it's a lot less. Have used it 2x. If you spray cat in the kitchen, careful as it makes the floor super slippery after that. Will continue to use but may be too early to tell if it's really helping with the dander/dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: klp30

customer_reviews.title: The Best Remedy for Kitty Dandruff!
customer_reviews.text: This is the answer to kitty dandruff! A bath definitely helps, but thus far I have sprayed my two aging cats three times on their backs near the tail and have not seen dandruff since. Kitty doesn't like the spray much, but they'll get over it. This stuff is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, light fragrance, cleans and shines as it detangles.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st cat grooming product I've purchased, my cat has long hair and gets tangles on her underside. CatFresh is a great surprise since it provides a light, lovely scent; it is not at all heavy so brushing cleans and brightens my cat's hair. Lot's of great benefits. Works for me and my cat actually seems to like it too. I'll continue to use this for her grooming.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once and saw a huge improvement in dander. Very happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Flakes go away!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! Smells so good and has made a huge improvement in kitty's skin condition. Thank you to PeachyDog for coming up with this safe natural way to relieve the irksome "dandruff" and restoring a glossy healthy coat!! Fast arrival too and vendor guarantee of satisfaction. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kaye

customer_reviews.title: I dont use it much ...my cat doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn't like being sprayed with this or any spray bottle
customer_reviews.author: Artlu

customer_reviews.title: he had extreme dandruff could tell he was uncomfortable now hes soft 80%dandruff free and feeling more comfortable in his skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7yr old long haired Maine Coon 21 lbs cant reach his back , he had extreme dandruff could tell he was uncomfortable now hes soft 80%dandruff free and feeling more comfortable in his skin. This product rocks! Highly recommend. Will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Helps to clean and condition my 18 yr old
customer_reviews.text: I just got the Catfresh spray to use on my 18 yr old tabby. He has a problem with incontience now and the spray does helps clean him up in between baths. I notice that it is helping to keep his skin from being so irritated and helps with the dryed on urine. Can not tell that it is helping as much with the urine odor but he wets himself so much it is hard to stay ahead of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I love it. My skittish cat is finally letting me put it on her brush. It smells lovely and her coat is looking better and better. I got a rescue 5 yr old long hair so it's taken time. I'm so glad I ordered this product. Will order it again. ❤️👍🏼💯
customer_reviews.author: ChrisAnn McBride

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This product works amazing! One of my cats has very dry skin and this is the only thing that works I've tried out of many many products.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat and I love it! It’s super easy to use! It’s vet approved! So, I know it’s safe for my cat! The fragrance is very Subtle and sweet! It helped with the Mats, dandruff and softness of the fur. It’s worth the every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jara U.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My cat is almost 18 years old
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My cat is almost 18 years old. She suffers with dandruff producing dry skin. This product has been a life saver for her. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fatkatn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and when my cat lets me spray her, the dry skin & itching diminishes
customer_reviews.author: kathleen a sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Pepper
customer_reviews.text: I got this due to my cat licking n loosing hair. I've used it on Pepper he's not a big fan of spray but I try it seems like it's helping he's a nervous kitty so you don't get to do a good job every time. He's scratching less n that's good
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Did not really treat my cat's scaly skin or clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not really treat my cat's scaly skin or clean her the way I hoped. Will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My cat used to have dandruff for several years. I sprayed this product on her fur just few times and and situation now is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Da Vi

customer_reviews.title: Helped get rid of dandruff on back
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. Although my cat hates being sprayed, I spray the back of his coat a couple times a week and it has drastically improved his dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. My cat doesn't seem to be very good at grooming and had super bad pet dander and clumps of fur, that we couldn't brush out. We wiped some of this on her fur and brushing is much easier. Also, the dander is pretty much gone. Its so nice to pet her and her fur feels soft and good again.
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: Grumpy cat, no more
customer_reviews.text: Our grumpy cat has loved being sprayed. He is less grumpy now that he isn't so itchy. We don't see any visable dandruff and have only used a couple of times. Product smells good and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Campau

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Our cat's fur definitely feels softer. She gets a massage every time I apply it, then I brush her. It's a win/win!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! My cat was *itchy* and pulling at her fur. ONE use and that stopped! Very refreshing and cleansing. Will buy again and DEFINITELY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Okay at best
customer_reviews.text: This will make your cats fur smell nice and feel soft. But it does not seem to do much else.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Davis

customer_reviews.title: Transformed 21 year old cat’s fur
customer_reviews.text: Made a huge difference for my mother’s 21 year old cat. His fur was dry and dull. Now it is soft and shiny again! He looks years younger!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This has been great for my kitties skin and fur
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my kitties skin and fur. They may not enjoy being sprayed with it, but you can tell afterwards that they seem to appreciate it. The dandruff is gone, and it even helped get out a little matoo in my one cats fur!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Van Hammond

customer_reviews.title: I love the fragrance and she is happy
customer_reviews.text: When used 2-3 times per week, my cats dander is gone, her coat is smooth and her back is not dry and itchy. I love the fragrance and she is happy!
customer_reviews.author: WJC

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My cat had BAD dandruff on his lower back. I researched products on decided on giving this a try. It worked after a couple of applications! Spray on liberally and massage into skin, gentally brush and repeat the nextday.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Relief for your kitty!
customer_reviews.text: This spray is like magic for my older cat. She has almost constant skin irritations and this spray gives her the relief she desperately needs.
customer_reviews.author: K J O

customer_reviews.title: My cat freaks out when I put anything on her ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat freaks out when I put anything on her but rubbing this on her calms her. She keeps getting scratches from playing with the other cat and it seems to lessen the redness and healing time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very good product.It made my cat's itch scaly skin vanish.He loved it.I just sprayed in on and wiped it in with a soft cloth.He enjoys it and it smells light and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen w.

customer_reviews.title: Smelly cat, smelly cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates baths but didnt mind this and it made him smell so good!
customer_reviews.author: Austina Cronk

customer_reviews.title: Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and seems to work well. One small note, it REALLY bothered my kitty when I used it on one of her hot spots.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Keeps my Black Persian from getting knots and dry skin. Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bomar

customer_reviews.title: Over weight cat butt cleaning
customer_reviews.text: My over weight cat occasionally has a problem cleaning his butt and I have to clean it. I wanted something that would not cause him a lot of stress, pain or make him sick, CatFresh skin and coat spray was exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: M. ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works well gives cat a nice shine, no smell,
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Leaves cat hair shiny and super soft. I spray on brush and then just brush cat. Have not witnessed cat trying to lick it off - good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: My cat had no fur on half of his back ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat had no fur on half of his back I have been using this product and my cat actually has hair growing back now
customer_reviews.author: Martha M Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Cat dandruff cleared up after one use. Spayed and a washcloth and then applied as if petting the cats. Both did not mind at all and left coats clean and soft. Not oily or greasy
customer_reviews.author: rachael tolliver

customer_reviews.title: CatFresh Natural Oatmeal Skin & coat Spray
customer_reviews.text: I spray this on a baby wipe and rub it all over my female Tortie Cat named Macy. She loves it. Thanks. Judy Larson
customer_reviews.author: Judy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Really works😺
customer_reviews.text: This has proved to be very beneficial to my elderly cat's coat. Due to age and arthritis, his coat was dull and getting mats. This spray has made grooming him so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Helps a bit
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping some with my cats itchy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old cat has had lots of flaky spots on his back from not grooming himself as well anymore. Since starting to use the CatFresh spray he has a lot less flakes and his coat is in better condition. He doesn't seem to mind the spray and loves when I rub the product into his coat!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Zabka

customer_reviews.title: It does work!
customer_reviews.text: Even with daily brushing my long haired cat had greasy fur and LOTS of large dandruff flakes. After using this product her fur is now nice and fluffy, she smells great and after three uses her dandruff is significantly improving. I'm pleased!
customer_reviews.author: GUPPY182

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. My older cat’s hair was very thin on his back. This spray has thickened it up. Soft and no see through to the skin. Hope it stays available for more future purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells great and is really helping my kitty
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells great and is really helping my kitty. The doctor thinks she has a skin allergy. This is the only thing that has helped so far.. vets and pet stores should carry this at all locations. Thankful I took a gamble and bought it when I found it on amazon searching for something that could help and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did seem to help along with changing the food to no artificial coloring
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and I'm sure it works great too
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and I'm sure it works great too! But I wouldn't know because my cat is terrified of it...
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Skin treatment
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product very much smells clean and my birthday doesn't run from it when I spray her
customer_reviews.author: dmac

customer_reviews.title: Zero customer satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a zero if I could. Product arrived with cap broken off and liquid in the bag. I want a refund, this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Sayles

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time and my calico didn’t mind it being used on her
customer_reviews.author: Karena B

customer_reviews.title: Sponge cat!
customer_reviews.text: This actually works! Just make sure to give your cat a good massage in his undercoat, and after it dries comb the cats out of him/her!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

product_meta.title: CatFresh Oatmeal Skin & Coat Spray Cleanses & Detangles, Soothes Irritations that Cause Excessive Licking, Chewing & Scratching, Moisturizes & Rejuvenates Skin, Neutralizes Odors & Removes Dander
feature_bullets: CONDITIONING, CLEANSING, NO-RINSE SHAMPOO SPRAY all the benefits of a bath, without the hassle
REMOVES DANDER, rejuvenates & hydrates the skin on paws, pads and other sensitive patches
BAKING SODA AND OATMEAL reduces need for licking, chewing & biting of irritated areas, giving the skin chance to heal
GENTLE ingredients for sensitive skin, kittens & other small fury animals
SOAP & DETERGENT FREE, won’t strip coat or irritate eyes
